traits.Hold Breath: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
traits.Skewer: Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

actions.Multiattack: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Trident: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
